overview.en: Sperax ecosystem issues two tokens: SPA as the network token on BDLS and sCOIN the native stablecoin. Sperax is the first decentralised system with a native stablecoin.SPA is the governance token for the protocol.SPA has a fixed five billion supply. There will not be inflation in the future.
overview.zh: Sperax发行两种代币：BDLS共识层的区块链治理币SPA，金融服务层的原生稳定币sCOIN。 Sperax区块链是首个具备原生稳定币的去中心化系统。SPA是协议的治理代币。SPA的固定供应量为50亿个。未来不会有通货膨胀。
